briefTitle: 3D Ultrasound for the Imaging of Lymph Nodes in Patients With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: 3D Ultrasound Imaging of the Axillary Lymph Nodes
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Lymph node diagnosis by radiologist (benign or malignant) (Aim 2)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with lymph node biopsy or lymph node clip placement as per routine clinical care.
* Age of 18 or older.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Vulnerable subjects such as prisoners and adults lacking capacity to consent.
